Title: Easily Spot These Costly Business Decisions
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•       How to show honor when transferring a family business from one generation to the next

•       A business owner that makes $150,000 in only three months

•       The best way to protect yourself and your assets from lawsuits

•       Why your “slush fund” could be hiding major financial issues in your business
